name: The Cybergoyle of Gózer - Galactible™ #28
description:
Holy Gargoyles! You’ve discovered Galactible™ #28, the “Cybergoyle of Gózer!” This ghastly creature (half machine, half gargoyle) guards the entrance to the Crystal Caves of Gózer. The only way through is to slay the beast! Harness the tools you’ve collected and use your whit! Your mana has been lowered by -300,000 bits! 

Galactibles™ are one-of-a-kind and minted as 1-of-1. Only 99 will be made! New Galactibles™ drop every week (sorta) on twitter, so give us a follow @Galactibles! Certified authentic and original animations, sound effects, and music made by Pyramid Guy (IG: @pyramidguy), aka Kris Kanaly (TW: @kriskanaly). Galactibles™ ©2022 | galactibles.com
